title: Did Betsy DeVos Say ’40 Percent’ Means ‘More Than Half’?
subtitle: Reports that the Education Secretary said a 40 percent approval rating meant President Donald Trump has the support of "more than half the country" were satire.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Betsy DeVos said that a 40 percent approval rating meant that President Trump had the support of more than half the country.
